reviews.review: Fajna gierka tylko gdyby nie te spadki fps
Fun game with friends, only bad thing is a lot of cheaters at higher ranks (MGE+)
the toxicity is what makes this game fun, you can play soccer with the enmy team or blast thier heads off this game is good fo multiple hours of fun.

If u wanna be good in this game, u need skill
This is the most time consuming game i've played and also the most infuriating community but hands down a good game. If you have friends to play with.

gunplay is lame. Shoot two bullets and your gun cant shoot straight even if you tap the button and wait in between shots, it doesnt matter the slightest. Shooting someone in the head with a desert eagle won't kill them 100% of the time.... AWP users dont even have to hit you to kill you. Even though this game is an "ESPORTS" title there are a lot of hackers. Avoid this degenerate soyboy game.
TA WENO, es un juego competivo si eres bueno con el aim en primera persona te lo recomiendo ;3
I like the most that this game have many cheaters
Such a good game when ur trust above yellow...
